column2: # Plot of SDM based on current climates
geom_raster(data = predictions, aes(x = x, y = y, fill = probability)) +
ggtitle("GLM - Probability of Hooded Warbler Presence") +
ggsave(SDM_current, filename = here("Lab6_SDMs_correlative", "maps", "warbler_SDM_current.png"), dpi = 150, units = c('in'), width = 10, height = 6)
